english.segment1: The black of night is closing in around you. The crippling fear moves in as they strap you down. Will you let a moment get the best of you. Will this situation bring you around
english.segment2: When the blood stains dry. Will it bring you around. Will it pass you by
english.segment3: Right now you're bruised and bleeding. I see the hurt within your eyes. I know your pain is for a reason. You need to feel just to know that You're alive
english.segment4: The days have turned to weeks but it's not over
english.segment5: The bandages rewind you to where you've been. These memories will remind you. When life takes you out will it bring you around
english.segment6: When it's said and done. Will it bring you around. What will you become
